products.title: Aria Zinc
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure aria zinc perfect fit roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality perfect fit roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 330mm max width: 1400mm

 	fabric composition: polyester
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	controls: tensioned system, move bottom bar to raise/lower blind.
